content: increase x 16 96 **note all beads will be crocheted to attach with a single_crochet where the pattern says bead you will work a single_crochet to attach the bead when you crochet to attach a bead in this row the suggested attachment is to attach the bead on top of the work this is only one style of attaching beads you can use any of them for this step see tip 4 5 and 6 to choose between them tips begin on page 30 of the text-only version or page 4 of the photo version to attach a bead on top of the work see photo version of tip 5 for photos on how to do this page | 33 © 2024 megan lapp crafty intentions™ all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ 7 single_crochet 5 increase x 16 112 **note each increase in this row should be worked into the second stitch of the increase from the previous row **note it is optional to fasten_off here with a long enough yarn tail to weave in later for a medium möbius strip fidget 8 single_crochet bead single_crochet increase single_crochet bead single_crochet x 16 128 **note all beads will be crocheted to attach with a single_crochet where the pattern says bead you will work a single_crochet to attach the bead you can use any style of bead attachment for this step see tip 4 5 and 6 to choose between them tips begin on page 30 of the text-only version or page 4 of the photo version 9 single_crochet 7 increase x 16 144 fasten_off with a long enough yarn tail to weave in weave in the yarn tail using a darning needle if you enjoyed
